content:
Project Name
Client
Brief Description
Key Analyses
Sales reporting BI Dashboards 
Luxury Cosmetics Company 
Sanitized and consolidated product master data from 
discrete sources and created integrated interactive sales 
reporting on Power BI for the management
Power BI dashboards for 
management
1
SUCCESS STORIES - SUMMARY

SALES REPORTING BI DASHBOARDS FOR LUXURY COSMETICS COMPANY 
SITUATION
▪
Client has different systems to capture sales from Wholesale, Retail and Online channels with non-standardized product naming 
conventions across systems
▪
High effort required to track the product level sales across the company due to the lack of a consolidated sales database
▪
Merilytics closely partnered with the Finance team of the brand to harmonize the product information across systems and create accurate 
sales reporting dashboards for the management
▪
Harmonized the product information data across discrete systems and helped the brand transition to the new standardized product 
hierarchy based on universal product code (UPC)
▪
Consolidated the FY17 to FY20 sales data from various systems (Revel, ICAT/Magento, QuickBooks and SAP) using the standardized product 
mapping and helped with the clean-up of SKUs
▪
Setting up a cloud-based data hosting platform to enable real-time update of the sales data from discrete systems
▪
Creating dynamic and interactive cloud based BI reporting dashboard for consumption by the management
VALUE ADDITION
IMPACT
▪
The harmonized product mapping information enabled the brand to transition to the new standardized product hierarchy
▪
The cloud-based platform streamlines the sales consolidation process from different sources for the brand
▪
The BI dashboard will enable management to track the accurate product level sales information and devise accurate product strategies
ABOUT THE CLIENT
Client is  US based luxury cosmetics company primarily in the online space.
2

QuickBooks
(Wholesale)
